item.title: I Gave ChatGPT $500 to Invest in Stocks. Its Picks Surprised Me
item.description: When it comes to creative tasks like writing, GPT-5 feels like a major step backward. But, I’ve seen it excel at many pragmatic tasks.

item.title: Don’t Sweat the Stock Market’s Similarities to the Dot-Com Bubble
item.description: Big Tech companies in the AI era are far more profitable than those from the internet boom.

item.title: How This AI Startup Could Help Businesses With Long-Range Weather Forecasting
item.description: Planette is harnessing AI to offer financial institutions and other firms intelligence about what the weather will do over the next few months.

item.title: Why Small Business Owners Should Adopt a Back to School Mindset at All Times
item.description: The best students are self-directed and develop their own learning tools and resources. Founders should take note.

item.title: Mark Manson Used the 4-Hour Rule to Write a Bestseller. Science Says It’s the Secret to Doing Great Work
item.description: The author of The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F**k struggled for 15 months to write his best-seller before he stumbled on the 4-hour rule. It changed e...
